title: A Song For Bob
description:
Another huge win for Team Minihane in The Dozen last night (00:01:00). Nikki Glaser, comedian and podcaster, released a tribute song to Bob Saget (00:31:10). Ken Laird replaces old friend Jeff Rickard as program director at WEEI (00:51:00). Skip Bayless has a new podcast, The Skip Bayless Podcast, where he delves into his competitive nature on TV (01:00:00). Mut is the only person on the radio who knows how to play along (01:07:25). Mike was a guest on 'At A Theater Near Me' (01:09:00).


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
